name: Urban Explorers
description:
Story

A group of teens thirsty of answers, started a Paranormal Investigation Group to explore creepy places, finding out what is happening is just the beginning. Surviving to tie all the clues from all the important places of the town before someone discovers what the group is doing…

Gameplay

  • Explore, gather items, manage your resources and your partner’s, solve puzzles and deal with strange creatures.
  • Battle the final boss. 
  • Escape the place.
  • Restock and recover. Buy items you may need from the store.
